definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: If you analyze a Pixar film, you’ll find nary a flaw.
sentences.chinese: 如果你分析皮克斯电影，你会发现连一个缺陷也没有。

sentences.english: Catmull is determined that Pixar will be different.
He oversees animation at both Pixar and Disney.
sentences.chinese: 拉塞特同时兼任了皮克斯和迪斯尼的动画监制。

sentences.english: He has been Jobs the visionary founder, notably at Apple and Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经是那个创办了苹果和皮克斯的有远见的乔布斯。

sentences.english: Pixar's RenderMan is Pixar's core rendering technology.
sentences.chinese: Renderman是皮克斯的核心渲染技术。

sentences.english: First instance of a Pixar feature-length film using live-action.
sentences.chinese: 皮克斯的第一部使用了真人表演的故事片长度的电影。

sentences.english: It’s appropriate that design inspiration can be pulled from Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 当然你可以从皮克斯那里获得设计灵感。

sentences.english: Touching stories are masterstrokes of Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 感动人心的剧情才是皮克斯的绝招。

sentences.english: Sure, Pixar films are technical stunners.
sentences.chinese: 当然，皮克斯电影都很技术出色。

sentences.english: And Pixar does not look at sequels as a financial plan.
sentences.chinese: 皮克斯并不把续集看作是种商业计划。

sentences.english: The exhibition that was on before us was Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 在我们之前展出的是皮克斯公司的作品。

sentences.english: So was Andrew Witkin, a senior computer scientist with the animation studio Pixar.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位科学家，却拥有动画工作室皮克斯。

sentences.english: Pixar believes playful employees are more creative employees.
sentences.chinese: 皮克斯公司相信爱玩的员工更有创意。

pinyin: Ji2 bu3 li4 Gong1 zuo4 shi4

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
(of a movie, show etc) to attract large audiences
Isao Takahata (1935-2018), co-founder of Studio Ghibli
